long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uploading multiple photographs of 20 pictures or more into an album on Facebook has become a nightmare. Desktop view of a new post onto your album only allows the rearranging of 5 images at a time on the screen. Causing users to scoll, drag and drop on a slow and bulky interface. This Chrome extension would allow you to see and arrange ALL of the photographs you are trying to post at once!
